sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section
  >
    <v-skeleton-loader v-if="!isLoading"
      style="width: 100vw !important; height: 100vh !important;max-height: 100vh !important;"
      max-height="100vh"
      type="image"
    />
      <content v-else
        :page-name="'index'"
      >
        <router-view />
      </content>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import Content from "../../components/content/TheContent.vue";
export default {
  name: "AuthLayout",
  data: () =>({
    backgroundImage: null,
    isLoading : false
  }),
  mounted() {
    setTimeout(_ => this.isLoading = true,56000)
  },
  components: {
    Content,
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
